definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech
to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
emergency relief/to help the needy with cash or goods
to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
firefighting/to extinguish a fire and save life and property/to dive (of goalkeeper in soccer)
to save sb's life/(interj.) Help!/Save me!

sentences.english: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity, and save me from bloody men.
sentences.chinese: 求你救我脫離作孽的人，和喜愛流人血的人。

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個她所救的女孩之後在高中畢業典禮上致辭。

sentences.english: Then he rushed into Mr Sun's kitchen to save her.
sentences.chinese: 然後他衝進孫奶奶家的廚房去救她。

sentences.english: You can reroute the train and save the five people.
sentences.chinese: 你可以改變過車的行進方向去救那五個人。

sentences.english: Zhuge Liang speculated that the river would be covered by fog in three days, which saved himself later.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: It has saved my post-shave legs from irritation and allowed me to wear shorts all summer long.
sentences.chinese: 它救了我的後刮鬍子腿從刺激和允許我穿短褲夏天長。

sentences.english: Using the rope as a slide, Chien-Po helped the Emperor to safety.
sentences.chinese: 他們永繩索做了一個滑梯，把皇帝救到安全的地方。

sentences.english: He saved everyone in the village from harm.
sentences.chinese: 因此它救了全村人的生命。

sentences.english: Because he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are being tempted.
sentences.chinese: 他自己既然被試探而受苦，就能撘救被試探的人。

sentences.english: He was unexpectedly rescued from the desert.
sentences.chinese: 他絕處逢生，從沙漠被救了回來。

sentences.english: A mother will sacrifice her life for her children .
sentences.chinese: 母親將會捨身救自己的孩子。

sentences.english: The lifeboat brought off all the crew.
sentences.chinese: 救生船把船上所有船員都救了出來。

sentences.english: GuoLiang Zhou speculated that surface of river has fog and his speculation save himself.
sentences.chinese: 諸葛亮推測三日後江面有霧，他的推測救了自己。

sentences.english: The only way to save him is for Bogg to jump out after him and travel through time.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的辦法救他是博格跳出來後，他和穿越時間。

sentences.english: The survivors wandered about the jungle for days before being picked up by a search party.
sentences.chinese: 倖存者在叢林中游蕩了好幾天，才被搜索隊救出來。

definition: to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to lose one's life/to get killed
in imminent peril (idiom)/on the brink of crisis
